name: Kayyyy
wishText: I can't be with you for your birthday again so I hope this mpartially makes up for it, I love you hun <3
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised that was probably pretty fricken boring so I wanted to really put my skadussy into this
text4Adjective: I wanted to really put my skadussy into this
text5Content: You are are most special person in the whole world to me
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
